Container.Name: calibre-server
Container.Overview:
Calibre Server is a lightweight, server-only distribution of Calibre that provides web-based access to your ebook library. This image contains only the calibre-server component, making it faster, smaller, and more efficient than full Calibre installations.
Features: • Web-based ebook library access • OPDS feed support for reading apps • Multi-format ebook support (EPUB, MOBI, PDF, etc.) • Search and browse capabilities • Download books in various formats • Lightweight server-only installation
Configuration: • Library Path: Directory containing your Calibre library • Server Port: Web interface access port (default: 27020) • User/Group ID: For proper file permissions
Access your library at: http://YOUR-SERVER-IP:27020
